comment.author: 27442865@N08
comment._content: The date has to be after 1876 because the Observation Tower first appeared at the Centennial Exposition in Philadelphia.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Thanks again, sweinstein99. I moved the Flickr date to the middle of the 1872-1887 range that came with the Brainerd images. Might be able to get closer with some deeper research -- do you know when it was erected at Coney Island?

Deb Wythe
Digital Lab
